<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Specific User or Group (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/directoryusergroups/{user_group_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List a specific user or group of a tenant.
